com.planetj.taste.impl.transforms
Class CaseAmplification

java.lang.Object
  com.planetj.taste.impl.transforms.CaseAmplification
All Implemented Interfaces:
Refreshable, PreferenceTransform
public final class CaseAmplification
extends java.lang.Object
implements PreferenceTransform

Applies "case amplification" to each preference score. This essentially makes big values bigger and small values smaller by raising each score to a power. It could however be used to achieve the opposite effect. Be careful of overflow when using this with large preference values; it might be a good idea to apply ZScore first.

Author:
Sean Owen
